lead_paragraph: Alex Dowsett broke the one-hour world record, recording 52.937 kilometers (about 32 miles) for the iconic 60-minute challenge at the Manchester Velodrome.

headline.main: British Rider Sets Record in 60-Minute Ride
headline.print_headline: British Rider Sets Record in 60-Minute Ride

snippet: Alex Dowsett broke the one-hour world record, recording 52.937 kilometers (about 32 miles) for the iconic 60-minute challenge at the Manchester Velodrome.
